TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenHandler extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration
Public MustInherit Class SecurityTokenHandler Implements ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 安全性權杖處理常式的抽象基底類別。

span.span: The abstract base class for security token handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是從所有安全性權杖處理常式所衍生的基底類別。The class is the base class from which all security token handlers derive. 安全性權杖處理常式負責：A security token handler is responsible for: - 驗證安全性權杖 () 它設計來處理程序和封裝到權杖中包含宣告型別的物件。Validating security tokens () of the type it is designed to process and packaging the claims contained in the token into a object. - 序列化和還原序列化安全性權杖，其設計目的是要處理的類型。Serializing and deserializing security tokens of the type it is designed to process. - 序列化和還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句 ()，是指其設計目的是要處理的類型的權杖``項目。Serializing and deserializing key identifier clauses () that refer to tokens of the type it is designed to process to and from `` elements. - 建立安全性權杖從的實作方式所傳遞物件類別。Creating security tokens from a object passed by implementations of the class. - 從安全性 token 的實作來建立金鑰識別碼子句類別。Creating key identifier clauses from a security token for implementations of the class. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 會隨附現成提供的下列安全性權杖處理常式：Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) ships the following security token handlers out of the box: - - - - - - - - - - - 大部分的這些類別會公開實作的特定設計類別語彙基元的處理功能的其他成員。Most of these classes expose additional members that implement functionality that is specific to the processing of the tokens for which the class is designed. 在許多情況下可能是較好的方式衍生自這些類別，而不是直接從一個類別。In many cases it may be better to derive from one of these classes rather than directly from the class. 可以加入或從權杖處理常式集合中移除指定安全性權杖處理常式[<新增>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md)， [<移除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md)，或[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/clear.md)下的項目[ <securityTokenHandlers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md)組態檔中的項目。A security token handler can be added or removed from a token handler collection by specifying the [<add>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md), [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md), or [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/clear.md) elements under the [<securityTokenHandlers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md) element in a configuration file. 物件，其中包含處理常式集合的組態設定可以透過存取屬性和處理常式的集合，權杖處理常式的成員可以存取從屬性。The object that contains the configuration settings for the handler collection can be accessed through the property and the handler collection that the token handler is a member of can be accessed from the property. 您可以覆寫方法來處理您的處理常式會採用任何自訂組態項目。You can override the method to process any custom configuration elements that your handler takes. 類別會公開數個其他屬性和方法。The class exposes several other properties and methods. 根據您選擇實作的功能，您可能會覆寫部分或所有這些成員。Depending on the functionality that you choose to implement, you may override some or all of these members. 您必須覆寫屬性和設計成處理一般的方法，以提供 WIF 基礎結構的安全性權杖的類別類型的相關資訊。You must override the property and the method to provide the WIF infrastructure with information about the type of security token that your class is designed to process. 驗證、 序列化和還原序列化功能會公開屬性或方法，以指出此處理常式是否可以執行結合的方法或實作功能之方法的特定函式。Validation, serialization, and deserialization functionality is exposed through properties or methods that indicate whether the handler can perform a specific function combined with the method or methods that implement the functionality. 下列清單配對的屬性或方法，以指出實作該功能的方法與功能：The following list pairs the properties or methods that indicate functionality with the methods that implement that functionality: - 屬性和方法： 驗證權杖，並封裝到權杖中包含的宣告。The property and the method: Validates a token and packages the claims contained in the token into a . - 屬性和方法： 語彙基元序列化。The property and the methods: Token serialization. - 方法和方法： 權杖還原序列化。The methods and the methods: Token deserialization. - 方法和方法： 還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句。The method and the method: Deserializing key identifier clauses. - 方法和方法： 序列化金鑰識別碼子句。The method and the method: Serializing key identifier clauses. 和方法從管線中的實作呼叫類別。The and the methods are called from the pipeline in implementations of the class. WIF 基礎結構，以判斷是否已收到指定的語彙基元會呼叫方法。The method is called by the WIF infrastructure to determine whether the specified token has already been received. 這個方法會傳回預設`false`，這表示，語彙基元不已接收。By default this method returns `false`, which indicates that the token has not already been received. 您可以覆寫方法，並提供邏輯，可偵測重新執行的權杖。You can override the method and provide logic to detect replayed tokens. ## Examples 所有的程式碼範例主題摘錄自`Custom Token`範例。The code examples in all of the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列 XML 會示範如何將 SWT 權杖處理常式加入至權杖處理常式集合。The following XML shows how to add the SWT token handler to the token handlers collection. ```xml ```

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CanReadKeyIdentifierClause (System.Xml.XmlReader reader);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanReadKeyIdentifierClause(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CanReadKeyIdentifierClause (reader As XmlReader) As Boolean
public: virtual bool CanReadKeyIdentifierClause(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ reader);

param.name: reader
param.span: 位於開始項目的 XML 讀取器。

span.span: An XML reader positioned at the start element.

param.span: 不應透過這個方法將讀取器向前移。

span.span: The reader should not be advanced by this method.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示指定的 XML 讀取器所參考的 XML 項目是否為此執行個體可還原序列化的金鑰識別項子句。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the XML element referred to by the specified XML reader is a key identifier clause that can be deserialized by this instance.

returns.span: 如果 方法可以讀取項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the method can read the element; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會傳回`false`來指示將無法讀取金鑰識別碼子句。The default implementation returns `false` to indicate that the key identifier clause cannot be read. 在衍生的類別會檢查讀取器以判斷執行個體是否可以還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句所參考的項目。A derived class checks the element that the reader is referring to in order to determine whether the instance can deserialize a key identifier clause. 通常這是透過呼叫方法與指定的適當項目和命名空間字串。This is typically accomplished through a call to the method with the appropriate element and namespace strings specified. 如果您覆寫，您也必須覆寫方法以提供還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句的邏輯。If you override , you must also override the method to provide the logic to deserialize the key identifier clause.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示指定的語彙基元是否可還原序列化為此執行個體所處理的型別語彙基元。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified token can be deserialized as a token of the type processed by this instance.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified string can be deserialized as a token of the type processed by this instance.

returns.span: 如果 方法可以讀取項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the method can read the element; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 `false`。The default implementation always returns `false`. 如果您覆寫這個方法，您也必須覆寫方法，以提供邏輯以還原序列化語彙基元。If you override this method, you must also override the method to provide the logic to deserialize the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的實作 (Implementation) 一定會傳回 `false`。The default implementation always returns `false`. 在衍生的類別會檢查讀取器以判斷執行個體是否可以還原序列化的安全性語彙基元所參考的項目。A derived class checks the element that the reader is referring to in order to determine whether the instance can deserialize a security token. 通常這是透過呼叫方法與指定的適當項目和命名空間字串。This is typically accomplished through a call to the method with the appropriate element and namespace strings specified. 如果您覆寫，您也必須覆寫方法或方法以提供還原序列化金鑰識別碼子句的邏輯。If you override , you must also override the method or the method to provide the logic to deserialize the key identifier clause. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫方法，以判斷是否可以處理常式所讀取的語彙基元。The following code shows how to override the method to determine whether a token can be read by a handler. 程式碼取自`Custom Token`範例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在衍生類別中實作驗證，請覆寫此屬性以傳回`true`並覆寫方法來實作驗證邏輯。To implement validation in a derived class, override this property to return `true` and override the method to implement the validation logic. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫屬性，指出自訂處理常式可以驗證權杖。The following code shows how to override the property to indicate that a custom handler can validate tokens. 程式碼取自`Custom Token`範例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在衍生類別中實作序列化，覆寫此屬性以傳回`true`並覆寫方法來實作序列化邏輯。To implement serialization in a derived class, override this property to return `true` and override the methods to implement the serialization logic. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫屬性，指出自訂處理常式可以序列化語彙基元。The following code shows how to override the property to indicate that a custom handler can serialize tokens. 程式碼取自`Custom Token`範例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). summary.span: 取得或設定為目前執行個體提供組態的 物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that provides configuration for the current instance.

value.span: 目前執行個體的組態物件。

span.span: The configuration object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常由設定基礎結構，從設定[ <securityTokenHandlerConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md)啟動期間的應用程式組態檔中的項目。The property is typically set by the configuration infrastructure from the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration.md) element in the configuration file during application start up. 在衍生類別中，您使用以存取組態設定的屬性; 例如，若要使用的簽發者名稱登錄方法可以存取從組態物件屬性。In derived classes, you use the property to access configuration settings; for example, the issuer name registry to use in the method can be accessed from the property of the configuration object.

span.span: The token handler collection that contains the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause CreateSecurityTokenReference (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token, bool attached);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause CreateSecurityTokenReference(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token, bool attached) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CreateSecurityTokenReference (token As SecurityToken, attached As Boolean) As SecurityKeyIdentifierClause
public: virtual System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKeyIdentifierClause ^ CreateSecurityTokenReference(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ token, bool attached);

param.name: token
param.span: 要為其建立參考的權杖。

span.span: The token for which the reference is to be created.

param.name: attached
param.span: 如果應建立附加的參考，則為 ，如果應建立為未附加的參考，則為 。

span.span: if an attached reference should be created; if an unattached reference should be created.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立該類別所處理之權杖的安全性權杖參考。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates the security token reference for tokens processed by that class.

summary.span: 這個方法通常是由安全性權杖服務 (STS) 呼叫。

span.span: This method is typically called by a security token service (STS).

returns.span: 參考所指定語彙基元的索引鍵識別項子句。

span.span: A key identifier clause that references the specified token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設這個方法會擲回例外狀況。By default this method throws a exception. 在衍生的類別覆寫此方法以傳回金鑰識別碼子句 () 可以用來建立``指定語彙基元的項目。Derived classes override this method to return a key identifier clause () that can be used to create a `` element for the specified token. 從實作呼叫類別。Called from implementations of the class. 一般而言，不需要使用，除了在建立自訂安全性權杖服務時。Typically, a does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created. 當安全性權杖服務傳回安全性權杖時，所發出的安全性權杖會包含已附加及未附加之安全性權杖的參考。When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens. 附加的參考會參考包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖，而未附加的參考則會參考未包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖。Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references reference security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message. 這些參考通常會證明這些發出之安全性權杖的真實性。These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫方法來建立金鑰識別碼子句，從指定的語彙基元。The following code shows how to override the method to create a key identifier clause from the specified token. 程式碼取自`Custom Token`範例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). [!code-csharp[WifRcCustomToken#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifrccustomtoken/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenhandler.cs#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken CreateToken (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor tokenDescriptor);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken CreateToken(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor tokenDescriptor) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CreateToken (tokenDescriptor As SecurityTokenDescriptor) As SecurityToken
public: virtual System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ CreateToken(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenDescriptor ^ tokenDescriptor);

param.name: tokenDescriptor
param.span: 要從其中建立權杖的安全性權杖描述元。

span.span: This method is called by a security token service (STS).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設這個方法會擲回例外狀況。By default this method throws a exception. 從實作呼叫類別。Called from implementations of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫方法來建立並傳回從權杖的描述元的語彙基元。The following code shows how to override the method to create and return a token from a token descriptor. 程式碼取自`Custom Token`範例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void DetectReplayedToken (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DetectReplayedToken(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub DetectReplayedToken (token As SecurityToken)
protected: virtual void DetectReplayedToken(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ token);

param.name: token
param.span: 要針對重新執行進行檢查的權杖。

span.span: The token to check for replay.

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，如果指定的權杖被偵測為被重新執行，則擲回例外狀況。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, throws an exception if the specified token is detected as being replayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作不做任何動作。The default implementation does nothing. 在衍生的類別應該擲回如果使用此語彙基元。Derived classes should throw a if the token has already been used. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 提供快取可能會衍生自哪一個重新執行的類別和[ <tokenReplayCache> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/tokenreplaycache.md)組態項目，可用來設定重新執行應用程式; 中的語彙基元處理常式所使用的快取不過，實際的實作方法是由衍生類別的設計工具。Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) provides the class from which replay caches may be derived and the [<tokenReplayCache>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/tokenreplaycache.md) configuration element, which can be used to configure the replay cache used by token handlers in an application; however, the exact implementation of the method is up to the designer of the derived class.

URI 值中的使用，例如``項目底下``要求特定種類的語彙基元的項目 (由物件模型中的屬性)。For example, the URI value used in the `` element under the `` element to request a specific kind of token (represented by the property in the object model). ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫方法以傳回自訂權杖的權杖類型識別項。The following code shows how to override the method to return the token type identifiers for a custom token. 程式碼取自`Custom Token`範例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設這個方法會擲回例外狀況。By default this method throws a exception. 驗證，並從已還原序列化的安全性權杖擷取宣告的基礎結構會呼叫方法。The method is called by the infrastructure to validate and extract the claims from the deserialized security token. 這些宣告會傳回集合中的方法所傳回的物件。These claims are returned in the collection of objects returned by the method. 在典型的案例中，這個集合會包含單一識別身分。In the typical case, this collection will contain a single identity. 在衍生類別中，驗證通常包括驗證針對 Uri 中指定的對象在權杖中指定目標對象屬性上指定的語彙基元處理常式組態物件屬性。In derived classes, validation typically includes validating the intended audience specified in the token against the audience URIs specified in the property of the token handler configuration object specified on the property. 這些 Uri 通常會在組態檔中設定為[ <audienceUris> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/audienceuris.md)項目。These URIs are typically set in the configuration file under the [<audienceUris>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/audienceuris.md) element. 如果無法驗證對象，應該擲回例外狀況。If the audience cannot be validated, an exception should be thrown. 當處理語彙基元，藉由將簽發者權杖傳遞至其中一個通常驗證簽發者方法已針對透過處理常式的物件屬性。When processing the token, the issuer is typically validated by passing the issuer token to one of the methods on the object that is configured for the handler through the property. 簽發者名稱登錄通常透過設定[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)組態檔中的項目。The issuer name registry is typically configured through the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element in the configuration file. 傳回簽發者名稱。The returns the name of the issuer. 這個名稱應該用來設定權杖中包含的宣告中的屬性。This name should be used to set the property in claims contained in the token. 如果簽發者名稱登錄未包含在簽發者的權杖的項目傳回`null`。If the issuer name registry does not contain an entry for the issuer token, returns `null`. 在此情況下通常會擲回在衍生類別中，但這種行為是由類別的設計工具。In this case a is typically thrown in derived classes, but this behavior is up to the designer of the class. MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void WriteKeyIdentifierClause (System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause securityKeyIdentifierClause);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteKeyIdentifierClause(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause securityKeyIdentifierClause) cil managed
public: virtual void WriteKeyIdentifierClause(System::Xml::XmlWriter ^ writer, System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKeyIdentifierClause ^ securityKeyIdentifierClause);

param.name: writer
param.span: XML 寫入器。

span.span: The XML writer.

param.name: securityKeyIdentifierClause
param.span: 要序列化的金鑰識別碼子句。

span.span: The key identifier clause to serialize.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將指定的金鑰識別碼子句序列化為 XML。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, serializes the specified key identifier clause to XML.

summary.span: 金鑰識別項子句必須是衍生類別所支援的型別。

span.span: The key identifier clause must be of the type supported by the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設這個方法會擲回例外狀況。By default this method throws a exception. 覆寫這個方法以提供要序列化成 XML 的金鑰識別碼子句的邏輯。Override this method to provide the logic to serialize a key identifier clause to XML. 如果您覆寫這個方法，您也應該覆寫方法。If you override this method, you should also override the method.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時序列化指定的安全性權杖。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, serializes the specified security token.

summary.span: 權杖必須是由衍生類別所處理的型別。

span.span: The token must be of the type processed by the derived class.

The serialized token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設這個方法會擲回例外狀況。By default this method throws a exception. 覆寫這個方法以提供要序列化成 XML 的安全性權杖的邏輯。Override this method to provide the logic to serialize a security token to XML. 如果您覆寫這個方法，您也應該覆寫屬性。If you override this method, you should also override the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設這個方法會擲回例外狀況。By default this method throws a exception. 覆寫這個方法以提供要序列化成 XML 的安全性權杖的邏輯。Override this method to provide the logic to serialize a security token to XML. 如果您覆寫這個方法，您也應該覆寫屬性。If you override this method, you should also override the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何覆寫方法，以序列化的自訂權杖。The following code shows how to override the method to serialize a custom token. 程式碼取自`Custom Token`範例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 這個範例提供自訂的類別，可啟用處理的簡易 Web 權杖 (SWT)。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 這個範例和其他可供 WIF 及如何下載這些範例的相關資訊，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md).
